Dubai Trade & User Management

What is Dubai Trade Portal?

Dubai Trade is an innovative, simple and secure portal that combines all electronic services provided by DP World, Economic Zones World, Dubai Customs and Dubai Multi Commodities Center. This single window provides exclusive electronic services to the trading communities aiming to be the online centric hub linking stakeholders through end-to-end trade supply chain. Who can avail the services through Dubai Trade Portal?

Are there any restrictions for accessing the Dubai Trade Portal and its services? Is my Information secure on the Dubai Trade Portal? Can any other user see my company’s information? Is Dubai Trade Portal Available 24x7?
